entry.title: Blood
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,109Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 2

Summary: Talon AU. Complete.After his parents were murdered, Dick was recruited into The Court of Owls, giving his loyalty in exchange for revenge. Sent on a task to kill Batman and his son, Dick learns that his path could have gone another way--that he was meant to be adopted by Bruce Wayne. With his trials coming up, Dick is on his final path to becoming a Talon, and must hurry to find the truth behind his origins and his heritage before giving his life to the Owls completely. His struggle is similarly faced by Damian, who gave up the assassin lifestyle but struggles to redeem himself for his old ways.

entry.title: We Are Not Poets
entry.summary:
Author: CallMeIzukuNotDeku

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,790Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 131

Summary: Coming back from Lazarus Pit Madness was a process that Jason wished was a lot easier. Now that he wasn’t completely under it’s influence, he was struck with brief moments where it sang violence in his ear before he had to deal with the guilt that came after. He had family, now. Family that was often forced to beg him—beg the pit—to put the gun down.It worked, for the most part, and Jason settles into a normal vigilante life as the Red Hood only to quickly realize that he doesn’t have much of a civilian life.He does his best to remedy this, though he’s not sure how to cope with the fact that he finds it nearly impossible to imagine himself leading a normal life without also imagining Tim by his side.OR Jason trying to find a new normal while still recovering from his dip in the pit.
